Fruit_type_and_notes: Fruit with fleshy, rarely woody, pericarp, endocarp not stony; either a berry with the non-arillate seeds embedded in pulp or projecting into the ovary on enlarged funicles (Ambelaniinae) or a pair of follicles (these sometimes hemi-syncarpous) with arillate seeds (most Tabernaemontaninae).
